name: Heritage Flight Academy
about: Heritage Flight Academy is a premier flying school dedicated to providing exceptional aviation training. With a rich history and a commitment to safety, our academy offers a comprehensive range of programs from private pilot licenses to commercial aviation certifications. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure students receive top-notch education and hands-on training. We pride ourselves on fostering a supportive learning environment that prepares students for successful careers in aviation. At Heritage Flight Academy, we are passionate about nurturing the next generation of pilots with excellence and integrity.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
